recipes.title: Homemade Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: A simple and classic Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, yeast, salt, warm water, and olive oil to form a dough.
Let the dough rise for 1 hour.
Roll out the dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly on the dough.
Garnish with fresh basil and serve hot.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Creamy pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs and mix with grated cheese.
Drain pasta and quickly toss with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.
